short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract Reviews from Trustpilot, download to .csv file

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌟 Download Trustpilot Reviews with Ease! 🌟

Introducing our powerful Chrome extension designed to simplify your review analysis tasks. Now, effortlessly download Trustpilot reviews directly into neatly organized CSV files, capturing detailed insights that are crucial for your business!

Key Features:

📥 Seamless Downloads: Convert Trustpilot reviews into CSV format with just a few clicks.
📜 Comprehensive Data Capture: Includes customer comments, business responses, customer interaction dates, and publication times.
🔄 Efficient Filtering: Utilize existing page filters to customize data retrieval according to your needs.
Easy Steps to Get Started:
1️⃣ Install the Extension: Quick and easy setup.
2️⃣ Navigate to a Trustpilot Review Page: Automatically locate download buttons once the page loads.
3️⃣ Adjust Filters (Optional): Apply specific filters or sort options as needed.
4️⃣ Download: Click on 'Download current page' to see your data in action in a CSV file, ready to be explored in Excel.
5️⃣ Go Beyond: Need more data? Follow prompts to subscribe for extended services.

🎉 Install for Free and Enhance Your Business Insights Today! 🎉

Join thousands who are already benefiting from our tool. Wishing you phenomenal success in your business endeavors!
